short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a random Quran ayah from AlQuran API with 4 different editions as options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a random Quranic Ayah every time the extension is opened, with the option to refresh for a new Ayah. Choose from four available editions for the Ayah's display, fetched seamlessly using the AlQuran API. Stay tuned for more updates and features!
